channel.title: Comments on: Fudgy Carob Brownies (AIP & Vegan)

item.title: By: Sara Lambert
item.dc:creator: Sara Lambert
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/fudgy-carob-brownies-aip-vegan/#comment-497">Stephanie</a>.
Oh, that's great! I'm going to make them this weekend and will definitely let you know!! Thx!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Stephanie.

Oh, that’s great! I’m going to make them this weekend and will definitely let you know!! Thx!

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/fudgy-carob-brownies-aip-vegan/#comment-496">Sara Lambert</a>.
Hi Sara, thanks for reaching out. Yes, canned pumpkin puree should work perfectly. Let me know how the brownies turn out for you!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Sara Lambert.

Hi Sara, thanks for reaching out. Yes, canned pumpkin puree should work perfectly. Let me know how the brownies turn out for you!

item.title: By: Sara Lambert
item.dc:creator: Sara Lambert
item.description: Hi there! Do you think it would be possible to sub out the sweet potato puree for pumpkin? Thx!
item.content:encoded: Hi there! Do you think it would be possible to sub out the sweet potato puree for pumpkin? Thx!

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/fudgy-carob-brownies-aip-vegan/#comment-485">Donna</a>.
Hi Donna, yes I think avocado oil should work just fine. I would love to hear how it works out for you!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Donna.

Hi Donna, yes I think avocado oil should work just fine. I would love to hear how it works out for you!

item.title: By: Donna
item.dc:creator: Donna
item.description:
Would this recipe work with avocado oil instead of coconut oil?
Thank you!
item.content:encoded:
Would this recipe work with avocado oil instead of coconut oil?

Thank you!
